owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only callable by the contract owner and when the contract is not paused

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.attestation: The existing attestation to be revoked.

returns._0: Whether the attestation can be revoked.

unpause().details: Only callable by the contract owner

attest((bytes32,bytes32,uint64,uint64,ui.notice: Processes an attestation and verifies whether it's valid.
